title: Bug 109718: Tips show large content in one line when it should show in a given format
description:

ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: The tips should show the content in a given format.
Actual Result: The tips show the content in one line.
OB: When I put large content in a text item and hover over it, the tips that appear show the content in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips should display the content of the text item in the specified format.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Put a large amount of content in a text item.
3. Hover over the text item.
4. Observe that the tips show the content in one line instead of the expected format.
